jobDescription: OverviewWho we are: Meridian is a family-owned, family-operated company of passionate leaders, achievers, and innovators dedicated to making a difference in the lives of our members, our providers and in the healthcare industry.  We provide government-based health plans (Medicare, Medicaid, and the Health Insurance Marketplace) in three different states (Michigan, Illinois, and Ohio).  Our employees work hard, play hard, and give back. Meridian employees enjoy: Happy hours, special events, company sports teams, potlucks, Bagel Fridays, weekly Executive Lunches, and volunteer opportunities. A Day in the Life of a Medicare Data Analyst: The Medicare Data Analyst is responsible for compiling, analyzing, trending, tracking, and interpreting all operational functions of the Medication Therapy Management (MTM) and Medication Adherence programs. The Medicare Data Analyst coordinates with all internal and external stakeholders in ensuring all regulatory and operational reports are created and submitted. This position will collaborate with the Program Coordinator and Medicare Programs Team Lead to ensure all program functions are completed on time, efficiently, and adhere to all Medicare
